prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that resembles a small, fluffy ball with large eyes.
I want to see a cute, insect-like creature with a white body and gray head.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon that combines elements of a caterpillar and a ghost.
Make an adorable Pokemon with big eyes and a soft, cloud-like appearance.

Design a Pokemon that looks like a puffy bug, perfect for a forest habitat.
